recipe.title: Spiced and Sour Mushroom Soup (Tom Yam Hed)
ingredients: 90 g (3 1/4 oz) straw mushrooms, trimmed and halved
instructions: In a saucepan, bring vegetable stock, shallots, galangal, lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves and chiles to a boil. Continue to boil for 4-5 minutes. Add oyster and straw mushrooms and cherry tomatoes. Once cooked remove from heat and season with miso paste, lime juice and apple concentrate.
